meanings.definition: A parasitic protozoan that causes trichomoniasis in humans and animals.
meanings.sent1: The trichomonas was found in the water sample under the microscope.
meanings.sent2: The veterinarian diagnosed the cat with trichomonas infection.
meanings.sent3: The trichomonas threw a party in the intestines, causing chaos.
meanings.sent4: The trichomonas spread through the population like wildfire.
meanings.sent5: I will never forget the image of trichomonas swimming in the pond.
